original_text: But the fig tree said to them, ‘Shall I leave my sweetness and my good fruit and go hold sway over the trees?’
korean_text: 무화과나무가 그들에게 이르되 나의 단 것과 나의 아름다운 열매를 내가 어찌 버리고 가서 나무들 위에 우쭐대리요 한지라

sentences.original_text: But the fig tree said to them,
‘Shall I leave my sweetness and my good fruit
and go hold sway over the trees?’
